name: LindoLife
0:
”Alexa, show my the camera Spotlight”
”Alexa, show me the backyard camera”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Lindo Life ip camera, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your Lindo Life ip camera using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !
How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is Lindo Life and login in it, search all device of ip camera. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable Lindo Life skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Enable “Lindo Life” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
After linking your Lindo Life account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control ip camera to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show me the camera spotlight cam"
if you want stop the Lindo Life ip camera from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"
Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen
more information you can visit https://www.lindolife.com
if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: https://www.lindolife.com
